h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: Spot dodging can also work here, and if you try to perform a Rock Solid Deflect, you'll be knocked backward, but he'll often stumble to the ground as well, letting you get up and get some hits in before he regains his footing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
Spot dodging can also work here, and if you try to perform a Rock Solid Deflect, you'll be knocked backward, but he'll often stumble to the ground as well, letting you get up and get some hits in before he regains his footing.
